body:
Hey everyone, I recently got an awesome intro, but I don't know how to edit it!
Could one awesome person take some time and edit this intro to say "Dooby & Porky" ???
I really like this intro but I seriously am not tech-smart enough to figure this out.
Thanks in advance, iDiamondPorkchop.
<3
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pocQdYz1KH0&feature=youtu.be

title: Need Editor!

replies.body: That's not going to be easy, the question is who did you get it from? It says "Template" and you want it to be "Dooby and Porky", it means we have to sort of have to reanimate the whole thing and put in "Dooby and Porky", try asking the original creator.
replies.body_tagged: That's not going to be easy, the question is who did you get it from? It says "Template" and you want it to be "Dooby and Porky", it means we have to sort of have to reanimate the whole thing and put in "Dooby and Porky", try asking the original creator.

replies.body: The original creator has 270K subs... Doubt he would do it for a channel with 3. (Velosofy)
replies.body_tagged: The original creator has 270K subs... Doubt he would do it for a channel with 3. (Velosofy)

replies.body: Just found out we can download the template ;) it'll be easier then :P
